author: William Penn
message: True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
title: Thought of the day

author: Immanuel Kant
message: All our knowledge begins with the senses, proceeds then to the understanding, and ends with reason. There is nothing higher than reason.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: The thought manifests as the word. The word manifests as the deed. The deed develops into habit. And the habit hardens into character.
title: Thought of the day

message: As the rest of the world is walking out the door, your best friends are the ones walking in.
title: Thought of the day
